summary: Completed frontend testing of eMarketWaka marketing website. All 7 marketing pages (/features, /solutions, /pricing, /partners, /about, /contact) are working correctly with proper content, navigation, and design. One critical issue: the root path (/) shows the admin page instead of the marketing homepage due to routing conflict.

integration_issues.issue: Root path (/) shows admin/tenant management page instead of marketing homepage. The marketing homepage exists at (marketing)/page.tsx but is overridden by the root page.tsx

action_items: CRITICAL: Fix routing conflict - root path (/) should show marketing homepage, not admin page. Either rename/move root page.tsx or configure Next.js routing to prioritize (marketing)/page.tsx for the root path
critical_code_review_comments: All marketing pages have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Navigation links have correct href attributes (/features, /solutions, /pricing, /partners, /about, /login)
Get Started CTAs correctly link to /login?signup=true
Mobile menu toggle works correctly on small screens
Contact form submission works with success message display
Green color scheme (green-600) and amber accents (amber-500) are properly applied
Nigerian business messaging ('Built for Nigerian businesses') is present in header and content
Footer has all required links and contact information
seed_data_creation: No seed data needed - static marketing website
context_for_next_testing_agent: Marketing website pages tested: /features (POS, Online Store, Marketplace sections), /solutions (Retail, Supermarket, Restaurant, Market, Distributor, Plaza), /pricing (Starter Free, Business â‚¦15,000/month, Enterprise Custom), /partners (Referral, Reseller, Implementation), /about (story, values, timeline, stats), /contact (form with name, email, phone, business, type, message). All pages have proper navigation header with logo, nav links, Login and Get Started buttons. Footer has company info, solutions links, company links, contact info. Mobile menu works. Contact form submits successfully. ISSUE: Root path (/) shows admin page instead of marketing homepage.

Marketing_Pages.Features page (/features): PASS - Hero, POS section, Online Store section, Marketplace section all present
Marketing_Pages.Solutions page (/solutions): PASS - All 6 industry solutions (Retail, Supermarket, Restaurant, Market, Distributor, Plaza) present
Marketing_Pages.Pricing page (/pricing): PASS - All 3 tiers (Starter, Business, Enterprise) with CTAs present
Marketing_Pages.Partners page (/partners): PASS - All 3 partner types (Referral, Reseller, Implementation) present
Marketing_Pages.About page (/about): PASS - Story, values, timeline, stats sections present
Marketing_Pages.Contact page (/contact): PASS - Form with all fields (name, email, phone, business, type, message) working
Marketing_Pages.Homepage (/): FAIL - Shows admin page instead of marketing homepage

Design.Nigerian business messaging: PASS - 'Built for Nigerian businesses' in header
